about_the_game:
Welcome to the ATOMIC TITANS Demo!

Get ready for an adrenaline-fueled arena brawl like no other! In ATOMIC TITANS, 48 players enter, but only the top 16 will advance to the ultimate showdown. Eliminate your foes, collect coins, and deposit them in the Vault for extra points. Can you rise to the challenge?

Master the mayhem with our six unique starting weapons:

  • Knife: Dash swiftly to outmaneuver your opponents.

  • Axe: Toss it for quick strikes or hold to lock on to your target.

  • Hammer: Swing for powerful area damage and take out multiple enemies at once.

  • Grenade: Deal devastating damage in a targeted area after a short delay.

  • Chainsaw: Unleash chaos with the ultimate melee weapon that tears through anything in your path.

  • Shields: Grab shields for a mad dash to the Vault and safely drop off your coins.

In the full game, every round you win earns you coins to spend in the store and upgrade your arsenal in the armory. Enhance your weapons to increase damage, range, knockback, stun effects, and hit area.

Whether you prefer game controllers or mouse and keyboard, you'll navigate the maps with ease. Perfect your timing to unleash speed boosts and powerful slides that provide temporary shields and knockback against enemies.

ATOMIC TITANS delivers endless high-energy competition with epic 48-player battles, six dynamic weapons, two melee attacks (shove and slide knockback), and a variety of treacherous maps filled with traps and boost vents.

Try the free demo now and gear up for the full game launch at the end of October. Are you ready to become an ATOMIC TITAN?

Whether you prefer game controllers or mouse and keyboard, you'll navigate the maps with ease. Perfect your timing to unleash speed boosts and powerful slides that provide temporary shields and knockback against enemies.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.9 (Mavericks) and Up
  • Processor: Any - 1 core and up 1.5ghz and up
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any - Supports Direct X9 and up
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any Sound Card Device
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OS X 10.9 (Mavericks) and Up
  • Processor: Any - 1 core and up 1.5ghz and up
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any - Supports Direct X9 and up
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any Sound Card Device

name: ATOMIC TITANS DEMO

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP, Windows Vista, or Windows 7 / 8
  • Processor: Any - 1 core and up 1.5ghz and up
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any - Supports Direct X9 and up
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 4 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any Sound Card Device
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or Greater
  • Processor: Any - Dual Core or Quad Core 1.5ghz and up
  • Graphics: Any - Supports Direct X9 and up
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any Sound Card Device

short_description: ATOMIC TITANS is an action packed battle between up to 48 players. Solo, and squad based teams compete in 3 short rounds to earn currency to spend on decorations and weapon upgrades. Pick a character from the 3 starter Tribes NINJAs, CUPCAKEs, and ZOMBIEs. Build up your friend list and play.
